sentences.en: "Marine animals release small amounts of urea, but the pollution problem is almost entirely human caused, " says Kudela.
sentences.cn: 库德拉认为海洋动物排泄的尿素很少，污染问题几乎都是人类造成的。

sentences.en: A kidney also takes urea and mineral salts out of the blood.
sentences.cn: 肾还排出血液中的尿素和无机盐.

sentences.en: B: check kidney blood urea nitrogen and serum creatinine.
sentences.cn: 肾功能检查: 测定血尿素氮和肌酐.

sentences.en: But 120 tons of urea is really a small one.
sentences.cn: 但120吨尿素确实是个小数目.

sentences.en: Decanediamide was synthesized using sebacic acid and urea as starting materials.
sentences.cn: 以癸二酸和尿素为原料合成癸二酰胺.

sentences.en: It must be broken down to urea, which consumes energy.
sentences.cn: 它必须被分解成为尿素, 这时也要消耗能量.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the resin of urea and formaldehyde is used for medium-density overlay (MDO), a combination of concrete and plywood, used in concrete moulds.
sentences.cn: 同时，尿素甲醛的树脂用于制造中密度板（MDO），这是一种混凝土和夹板的组合体，通常用于混凝土模具中。

sentences.en: Method: Serum Cystatin C, Urea, Scr and UrineMicroprotein ( UMP ) concentrations were measured in 1338 patients.
sentences.cn: 方法: 检测1338例患者CystatinC 、 血尿素(Urea) 、 血肌酐 ( Scr ) 和尿微量蛋白(UMP).

sentences.en: Nitrogen compounds, like urea, a big component of urine, are transformed over several steps.
sentences.cn: 含氮化合物如尿的主要组成成分尿素则经过几步被转化。

sentences.en: Plastics industry - All kinds of plastic molding particles made from phenol, urea, melamine, and epoxy.
sentences.cn: 塑料工业中的苯酚、尿素、密胺、环氧树脂等各种塑料成型的颗粒。

sentences.en: Sweat consists of water with small amounts of urea and salts.
sentences.cn: 汗液是由水和少量尿素和盐构成的.

sentences.en: The developing history, chemistry of spray polyurethane ( urea ) elastomers are simply introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了喷涂聚氨酯 ( 脲 ) 弹性体的发展简史及化学原理.

sentences.en: The preparation technology and usage of urea peroxide are discussed.
sentences.cn: 着重介绍过氧化尿素的制备、工艺研究及用途.

sentences.en: The test of ALT, AST, � � - GT, LDH, CHE, α - HBDH, α - Amy, CK, CK - MB, T - Bil, P - ALB , T - CHO, TG, HDL - Cho , ApoA 1, ApoB 100, GSP, D 3 and Urea levels are limited by using heparin.
sentences.cn: 目前条件下ALT 、 AST 、 -γGT 、 LDH 、 CHE 、 -αHBDH 、 -αAmy 、 CK 、 CK-MB 、 T-Bil 、 P -ALB 、 T-CHO 、 TG 、 HDL -Cho 、 ApoA1 、 ApoB100 、 GSP 、 D3和Urea运用肝素有局限性.

sentences.en: This paper describes intensity property of joined timber with urea - formaldehyde resin.
sentences.cn: 本文描述了脲醛树脂胶指接材的强度性能.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, elemental analysis will not yield any information as to the extent of contamination by urea.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 元素分析不能指出这个盐夹杂尿素的程度.

sentences.en: Urea is a neutral fertilizer, long - term use does not cause soil deterioration.
sentences.cn: 尿素是一种中性肥料, 长期 使用也不会使土壤变坏.

sentences.en: Urea is commonly used as the source of nitrogen in foliage sprays.
sentences.cn: 尿素作为氮素给源普遍地应用于叶面喷布.

sentences.en: Urea nitrogen is what forms when protein breaks down.
sentences.cn: 尿素氮是蛋白质分解的产物.
